TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BindingElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 用于为各种类型的通道生成通道工厂和通道侦听器以处理传出和传入消息的绑定元素。

span.span: The elements of the bindings that build the channel factories and channel listeners for various types of channels that are used to process outgoing and incoming messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绑定由一组继承自此抽象基类的有序绑定元素组成。A binding consists of an ordered set of binding elements that inherit from this abstract base class. 类从 类继承。The class inherits from the class. 如果只是使用通道模型，则可以选择创建用于传输的绑定和绑定元素。Creating a binding and binding element for your transport is optional if you are just using the channel model. 只要将通道工厂和侦听器设置为公共，就可以通过它们执行一切所需操作。It is possible to do everything you need through the channel factory and listener as long as they are made public. Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务模型使用工厂模式绑定用于创建通道堆栈。The Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service model uses a factory pattern where the binding is used to create the channel stack. 如果你想要使用的 WCF 服务模型，则使用的传输绑定元素是必需的。If you want to use the WCF service model, then using a transport binding element is required. 将此绑定元素置入绑定中是一个很好的做法，这样用户就无需为你的传输创建自己的自定义绑定。Placing this binding element into a binding is a good practice because it removes the requirement for users to create their own custom binding for your transport. 最好同时创建绑定和绑定元素，并将通道工厂和侦听器隐藏在程序集中。It is best to create both a binding and binding element, and hide the channel factory and listener inside the assembly. 在发送端，使用绑定生成 ，而后者生成通道堆栈并返回对堆栈中顶部通道的引用。On the sending side, a binding is used to build a , which in turn builds a channel stack and returns a reference to the top channel in the stack. 之后，应用程序可以使用此通道发送消息。The application can then use this channel to send messages. 同样，在接收端，使用绑定生成 ，用于侦听传入消息。Similarly, on the receiving side a binding is used to build a , which listens for incoming messages. 通过创建通道堆栈并将顶部通道的引用传递给应用程序，将消息提供给侦听应用程序。The provides messages to the listening application by creating channel stacks and handing the application a reference to the top channel. 之后，应用程序使用此通道接收传入消息。The application then uses this channel to receive incoming messages. > [!NOTE] > 如果要添加的消息头必须加密，则必须在要求 时，从 方法返回具有您的要求的 实例。If you are adding message headers that must be encrypted you must return a instance with your requirements from the method when asked for . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将传输绑定元素添加到自定义绑定，然后再生成可接受传入消息的通道侦听器。The following example shows how to add a transport binding element to a custom binding and then build a channel listener that can accept incoming messages. [!code-csharp[S_UEChannels#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uechannels/cs/servicesnippets.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_UEChannels#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uechannels/vb/servicesnippets.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要在生成工厂之前检查是否可以为提供的 `TChannel` 生成 `context` 类型通道的通道工厂，请使用此方法。Use this method if you want to check that the channel factory for channels of type `TChannel` can be build for the `context` provided before attempting to build the factory. 或者，通过调用 来生成通道工厂，并捕捉无法生成时所产生的异常。Alternatively, build the channel factory by calling and catch the exception generated if it cannot be built. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UEChannels#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uechannels/cs/clientsnippets.cs#18)]

Public MustOverride Function Clone () As BindingElement
public: abstract System::ServiceModel::Channels::BindingElement ^ Clone();
abstract member Clone : unit -> System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，返回绑定元素对象的副本。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns a copy of the binding element object.

returns.span: 一个 对象，它是原始绑定元素对象的深层克隆。

span.span: A object that is a deep clone of the original.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 方法以返回绑定元素的深层克隆。Implement the method to return a deep clone of your binding element. 通过返回克隆，运行时将能够支持多个自定义绑定共用一个自定义绑定元素的情况。Returning a clone enables the runtime to support the case in which multiple custom bindings share a custom binding element. 如果未返回克隆，则运行时行为将不可确定。If a clone is not returned, the run-time behavior is undefined. 对象的深层克隆创建对象的副本以及该对象直接或间接引用的所有内容的副本。A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object. （这也称为复制整个对象图。）相比之下，对象的浅表克隆只是对象本身的副本。(This is also called copying the entire object graph.) A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only. 如果对象包含对其他对象的引用，则浅表复制不创建所引用对象的副本，而是仅复制对原始对象的引用。If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects.

typeparam.span: 方法正在查询的类型化对象。

The for the binding element.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，从绑定堆栈的适当层返回所请求的类型化对象（如果存在）。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns a typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the binding stack.

returns.span: 如果存在，则返回所请求的类型化对象 ，如果不存在，则返回 。

span.span: The typed object requested if it is present or if it is not present.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以从绑定元素堆栈中检索功能、需求和参数。Use this to retrieve capabilities, requirements and parameters from the binding element stack. 如果绑定元素支持返回所请求的对象，则会返回对象。If a binding element supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不支持，就会将调用委托给堆栈中的下一个绑定元素。If not, it delegates the call down to the next binding element in the stack. 如果到达堆栈底部仍然没有绑定元素支持所请求的对象，则该方法返回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no binding element supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果要添加的消息头必须加密，则必须在要求 时，从此方法返回具有您的要求的 实例。If you are adding message headers that must be encrypted you must return a instance with your requirements from this method when asked for . ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UEChannels#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uechannels/cs/servicesnippets.cs#20)]
